p:
B4: Synthesis of ( E)-3-(2″-nitrophenyl)-1-[4′-(trifluoromethoxy)phenyl]prop-2-en-1-one: Yield: 56%; m.p. 69 °C; R
f = 0.87 (30% Ethyl acetate in Hexane); FT-IR (KBr, cm −1): 1640 (C=O), 1632 (Ar C=C), 1504 (CH=CH),1232 (-CF 3), 3012 (Ar C-H stretching), 1126 (-C-O-), 1462 (NO 2); 1H NMR (400 MHz, CDCl 3, ppm): δ: 7.85 (1H, d, J = 17 Hz, -CO-CH=), 8.28 (1H, d, J = 16 Hz, Ar-CH=), 8.27–8.51 (4H, m, C-2′, 3′, 5′, 6′, Ar-H), 7.05–8.25 (4H, m, C-3″, 4″, 5″, 6″, Ar-H); ESI-MS: 338.08 [M + H] +.
